pr_title: fix nullhandling exceptions related to test ordering

timeline.bodyText: nit: you can extend InitializedNullHandlingTest instead of adding a static block.
timeline.author: jihoonson

replies.bodyText: sure, I can do that, I merely copied this from other existing tests
replies.author: xvrl

replies.bodyText: Thanks. I think they were added before we add InitializeNullHandlingTest. We could clean them up someday.
replies.author: jihoonson

timeline.message:
fix nullhandling exceptions related to test ordering

Tests might get executed in different order depending on the maven
version and the test environment. This may lead to "NullHandling module
not initialized" errors for some tests where we do not initialize
null-handling explicitly.

fix nullhandling exceptions related to test ordering

version and the test environment. This may lead to "NullHandling module
not initialized" errors for some tests where we do not initialize
